titleInfo.title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-07-07 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-07-07 (as dated on disc label, announcement on the 1956-06-30 show suggests this show may have aired 1956-07-10 instead) part 2. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Bern Bennett, starring Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and his orchestra, and featuring Clyde McPhatter, the Platters, Della Reese, and Sugar & Spice. Produced and directed by Lou Melamed.

subject.topic: Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program)
